unnormalised: Bhai, geometry exam ke liye all the best! Remembering all those sin, cos, tan values is like trying to recall the 100 digits of pi - totally impossible, but good luck pulling a last-minute theorem out of your hat!
normalised: Bhai, geometry exam ke liye all the best! Remembering all those sine, cosine, tangent values is like trying to recall the one hundred digits of pi - totally impossible, but good luck pulling a last-minute theorem out of your hat!
